EmailTemplate.subject: Are digital branches the branch of the future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: While digital branches were inconceivable five years ago, they’re now emerging as a key component of the branch transformation strategy. Changing consumer behaviors and technology advances are positioning the digital branch to be more than just your brand presence. With 95% of transactions doable via self-directed channels and video teller technology enabling face-to-face banker support, digital branches let you redefine your branch network and reduce your real estate footprint – all while offering the exceptional service your customers expect. But what’s the best way to start the journey to building your digital first branch?
